00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;

00012 import java.sql.*;
00013 import java.text.ParseException;
00014 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00017 public class DB2Database extends AbstractDatabase {
00018     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00019         return getDatabaseProductName(conn).startsWith("DB2");
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00023         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:db2")) {
00024             return "com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver";
00025         }
00026         return null;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getProductName() {
00030         return "DB2";
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getTypeName() {
00034         return "db2";
00035     }
00036 
00037     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {//NOPMD
00038         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().toUpperCase();
00039     }
00040 
00041     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00042         return false;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getAutoIncrementClause() {
00046         return "GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY";
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00050         return "CURRENT TIMESTAMP";
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getBooleanType() {
00054         return "SMALLINT";
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00058         return "1";
00059     }
00060 
00061     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00062         return "0";
00063     }

00078     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00079         String normalLiteral = super.getDateLiteral(isoDate);
00080 
00081         if (isDateOnly(isoDate)) {
00082             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00083             val.append("DATE(");
00084             val.append(normalLiteral);
00085             val.append(')');
00086             return val.toString();
00087         } else if (isTimeOnly(isoDate)) {
00088             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00089             val.append("TIME(");
00090             val.append(normalLiteral);
00091             val.append(')');
00092             return val.toString();
00093         } else if (isDateTime(isoDate)) {
00094             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00095             val.append("TIMESTAMP(");
00096             val.append(normalLiteral);
00097             val.append(')');
00098             return val.toString();
00099         } else {
00100             return "UNSUPPORTED:" + isoDate;
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     public String getCurrencyType() {
00105         return "DECIMAL(19,4)";
00106     }

00109         return "VARCHAR(36)";

00120     public String getDateTimeType() {
00121         return "TIMESTAMP";
00122     }

00124     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00125         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQNAME AS SEQUENCE_NAME FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE SEQTYPE='S' AND SEQSCHEMA = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "'");
00126     }
00127 
00128 
00129     public boolean shouldQuoteValue(String value) {
00130         return super.shouldQuoteValue(value)
00131                 && !value.startsWith("\"SYSIBM\"");
00132     }
00133 
00134 
00135     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00136         return true;
00137     }
00138 
00139     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00140         return new RawSqlStatement("select view_definition from SYSIBM.VIEWS where TABLE_NAME='" + name + "' and TABLE_SCHEMA='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'");
00141     }
00142 
00143     public String getViewDefinition(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00144         return super.getViewDefinition(schemaName, name).replaceFirst("CREATE VIEW \\w+ AS ", ""); //db2 returns "create view....as select
00145     }
00146 
00147     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00148         if (defaultValue != null && defaultValue instanceof String) {
00149             if (dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00150                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\"SYSIBM\".\"TIMESTAMP\"\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00151             } else if (dataType == Types.TIME) {
00152                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\"SYSIBM\".\"TIME\"\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00153             } else if (dataType == Types.DATE) {
00154                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\"SYSIBM\".\"DATE\"\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00155             }
00156         }
00157         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00158     }
00159 
00160     protected java.util.Date parseDate(String dateAsString) throws DateParseException {
00161         try {
00162             if (dateAsString.indexOf(' ') > 0) {
00163                 return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00164             } else if (dateAsString.indexOf('.') > 0 && dateAsString.indexOf('-') > 0) {
00165                 return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd-HH.mm.ss.SSSSSS").parse(dateAsString);
00166 
00167             } else {
00168                 if (dateAsString.indexOf(':') > 0) {
00169                     return new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00170                 } else if (dateAsString.indexOf('.') > 0) {
00171                     return new SimpleDateFormat("HH.mm.ss").parse(dateAsString);
00172                 } else {
00173                     return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(dateAsString);
00174                 }
00175             }
00176         } catch (ParseException e) {
00177             throw new DateParseException(dateAsString);
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00182         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00183             return getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName();
00184         } else {
00185             return requestedSchema.toUpperCase();
00186         }
00187     }
00188 
00189     public String convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00190         return null;
00191     }
00192 
00193     public String generatePrimaryKeyName(String tableName) {
00194         String pkName = super.generatePrimaryKeyName(tableName);
00195         if (pkName.length() > 18) {
00196             pkName = pkName.substring(0, 17);
00197         }
00198         return pkName;
00199     }
00200 
00201     public boolean isColumnAutoIncrement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00202         boolean autoIncrement = false;
00203 
00204         PreparedStatement stmt = null;
00205         try {
00206             stmt = getConnection().prepareStatement("SELECT IDENTITY FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND COLNAME = ? AND HIDDEN != 'S'");
00207             stmt.setString(1, convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName));
00208             stmt.setString(2, tableName);
00209             stmt.setString(3, columnName);
00210 
00211             ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery();
00212 
00213             while (rs.next()) {
00214                 String identity = rs.getString("IDENTITY");
00215                 if (identity.equalsIgnoreCase("Y")) {
00216                     autoIncrement = true;
00217                 }
00218             }
00219             rs.close();
00220         } finally {
00221             if (stmt != null)
00222             {
00223                 stmt.close();
00224             }
00225         }
00226 
00227         return autoIncrement;
00228     }
00229 
00230     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00231         return new DB2DatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00232     }
00233 }
